  Default for all links:
  - disable underlines
*/
.common__link___1BB3z {
  text-decoration: none;
  -webkit-transition: all 0.2s ease 0ms;
  transition: all 0.2s ease 0ms
}
.common__link___1BB3z:hover,
  .common__link___1BB3z:focus,
  .common__link___1BB3z:active {
  outline: none;
  text-decoration: none;
}
/* Default definition for links with the teal color */
.common__greenLink___2dP4D {
  color: #36b4a7;

  &amp;:hover,
  &amp;:focus, {
    color: #626680;
  }
}
/* Default definition for links with the ink color */
.common__inkLink___kbbY2 {
  color: #1c203c;

  [data-darkmode="true"] &amp; {
    color: #FFFFFF;
  }

  &amp;:hover,
  &amp;:focus, {
    color: #626680;
  }
}

  border: 1px solid #d0021b;

.checked-input__label___3RIB_.checked-input__focus___2sAq2{color:#33364F}

.checked-input__infoText___17kLv {
  color: #9b9b9b;
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: normal;
}

.checked-input__errorText___1knu- {
  color: #d0021b;
}

.checked-input__successText___sdkGT {
  color: #36b4a7;
}

.checked-input__container___33GCY {
  position: relative;
  display: -webkit-inline-box;
  display: -ms-inline-flexbox;
  display: inline-flex;
}

/*
  When it comes to FF and IE, killing the browser's default styling of checkboxes and radio buttons
  doesn't really work; that's because of partial support for `appearance: none`.  Have a look at
  issues like:
  http://stackoverflow.com/q/30081748

  Mozilla even warns against usage of appearance: none to kill standard browser rendering of
  checkboxes/radio buttons:
  https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/-moz-appearance

  As such, we need to replace the style by hiding the input altogether, and styling around it.
  A negative z-index or `opacity: 0` will hide the input without removing it from the DOM, allowing
  for keyboard accessibility.  It shouldn't negatively impact SEO ranking.
*/

.checked-input__input___3BfRk {
  opacity: 0;
}

.checked-input__span___1DXuk {
  display: -webkit-inline-box;
  display: -ms-inline-flexbox;
  display: inline-flex;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  -webkit-box-pack: center;
      -ms-flex-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
  outline: none;
  color: #9b9b9b;
  background-color: #F2F2F5
}

.checked-input__span___1DXuk:hover {
  border: 1px solid #c8c8c8;
}

.checked-input__span___1DXuk {

  .checked-input__focus___2sAq2 &amp; {
     border: 1px solid #c8c8c8;
  }
}

.checked-input__icon___1sMqQ {
  z-index: 1;
  opacity: 0;
  -webkit-transition: all 0.2s ease 0ms;
  transition: all 0.2s ease 0ms;
}

.checked-input__label___3RIB_ {
  display: -webkit-inline-box;
  display: -ms-inline-flexbox;
  display: inline-flex;
  width: 100%;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: Calibre-Regular, TeXGyreHerosRegular, Helvetica, Tahoma, Geneva, Arial, sans-serif;
  color: #1c203c;
  font-weight: 100;
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: 1
}

.checked-input__label___3RIB_.checked-input__focus___2sAq2 {
  color: #33364F;
}

.payment-flow-form-layout__formLayoutContainer___-eRrB{display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-box-pack:center;-ms-flex-pack:center;justify-content:center;padding:5%}.payment-flow-form-layout__formLayoutInnerContainer___2oCu_{width:100%;max-width:1100px}.payment-flow-form-layout__innerFormLayoutContainerRow___1CblG{display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-box-orient:horizontal;-webkit-box-direction:normal;-ms-flex-direction:row;flex-direction:row;-webkit-box-pack:center;-ms-flex-pack:center;justify-content:center}@media (min-width: 768px){.payment-flow-form-layout__innerFormLayoutContainerRow___1CblG{-webkit-box-orient:horizontal;-webkit-box-direction:normal;-ms-flex-direction:row;flex-direction:row}}.payment-flow-form-layout__innerFormLayoutContainerColumn___fgBvq{display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-box-direction:normal;-ms-flex-direction:column;flex-direction:column;-webkit-box-pack:center;-ms-flex-pack:center;justify-content:center}@media (min-width: 768px){.payment-flow-form-layout__innerFormLayoutContainerColumn___fgBvq{-webkit-box-orient:horizontal;-webkit-box-direction:normal;-ms-flex-direction:row;flex-direction:row;-webkit-box-align:start;-ms-flex-align:start;align-items:start}}.payment-flow-form-layout__formContainer___32Oyg{width:100%;max-width:775px;background-color:#ffffff;border-radius:2px;-webkit-box-sizing:content-box;box-sizing:content-box}@media (min-width: 768px){.payment-flow-form-layout__formContainer___32Oyg{margin-bottom:16px;padding:24px}}.payment-flow-form-layout__noPadding___2Tm49{padding:0}
